member.name: T:InfoBox.InformationBox
member.summary: Displays a message box that can contain text, buttons, and symbols that inform and instruct the user.

member.name: M:InfoBox.InformationBox.Show(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Displays a message box with the specified text and parameters.
If the type of the parameter is The value will be used as
the title of the for the first string, the second string for the help file name, and the third one for the help topic id
which buttons to display on the .
which predefined icon to use for the .
the icon to use for the .
which button to set as default for the .
[] the text for the custom buttons of the .
the modal/modeless state of the .
the layout for the buttons of the .
how the will resize itself according to the text.
where the will appear on the screen.
whether the help button is displayed or not.
the Help content. You can use the following values for navigator: TableOfContents, Find, Index, or Topic.
whether the "Do not show this dialog again" checkbox is displayed or not.
Text to use instead of the default "Do not show again"
The parameters for the auto-close feature.
the parameters for the design (colors).
which icon will be displayed in the title bar.
the custom icon that will be displayed in the title bar.
the opacity of the .
the sound played upon display of the .
a method that will be called when a modeless dialog is closed.
A MessageBox enum value the value for the corresponding enum value.
A Form instance the parent of the .
member.param: The text to display in the message box.
The parameters of the message box.
member.returns: One of the values.

member.summary: Displays a message box with the specified text and parameters.
member.param: if set to true shows help button.
if set to true shows the do not show again check box.
If not null, the value will replace the default text for the "Do not show again" checkbox.
member.returns: One of the values.
